code: export default function postReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case"LOADPOST":state=action.payload;return state;case"LOAD":console.log(action.payload);state=action.payload;return state;case"ADDCOMMENT":var post=state.find(function(photo){return photo._id===action.payload.postid;});post.comments.push(action.payload);return state;case"DELETECOMMENT":var postD=state.find(function(photo){return photo._id===action.payload.postid;});var comments=postD.comments.filter(function(comm){return comm.comment!==action.payload.comment;});postD.comments=comments;return state;case"LIKE":var likedPost=state.find(function(photo){return photo._id===action.payload.postid;});likedPost.likes.push(action.payload.userid);return state;case"UNLIKE":var unlikedPost=state.find(function(photo){return photo._id===action.payload.postid;});var likes=unlikedPost.likes.filter(function(like){return like!==action.payload.userid;});unlikedPost.likes=likes;return state;default:return state;}}
